meta.title: Xiaohongshu Post Scraper - Extract Public Data Easily
meta.description: Fast and efficient tool to extract public post data from Xiaohongshu. Multi-dimensional data extraction with smart filtering and quick export.
meta.keywords: Xiaohongshu scraper, data extraction, RedBook tool, post analyzer, export data

hero.title: Xiaohongshu Post Scraper
hero.tagline: Extract Public Post Data with Ease
hero.languageNotice: üåè Chinese and Korean versions coming soon!

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Powerful tools for efficient data extraction

extraction.title: Multi-dimensional Data Extraction
extraction.description: Capture post titles, content, images, tags, engagement metrics, and author information

export.title: Fast Export
export.description: Export to CSV, JSON, or Excel format with one click for easy analysis

filtering.title: Smart Filtering
filtering.description: Filter posts by date range, engagement level, or keywords to get exactly what you need

download.title: Installation & Usage
download.subtitle: Get started in minutes

step1.title: Download Extension
step1.description: Download the browser extension from our official website

step2.title: Navigate to Xiaohongshu
step2.description: Open any profile or search results page on Xiaohongshu

step3.title: Start Extraction
step3.description: Open the extension and select the posts you want to extract data from

download.note: Note: This tool only captures publicly visible data. No login required.

demo.title: See It In Action
demo.subtitle: Example data extraction preview
demo.sampleCaption: Sample extracted data showing post metrics, engagement, and metadata

footer.disclaimer: This tool is for educational and research purposes only. Always respect platform terms of service and data privacy regulations.
